name: A Silent Month in a House
desc: After an ally target attacks a Weakness Broken enemy target, deals 1 instance(s) of "Aftertaste" DMG equal to 100% of the ally target's ATK to the attacked enemy target.
enhanced_desc: After an ally target attacks a Weakness Broken enemy target, deals 1 instance(s) of "Aftertaste" DMG equal to 150% of the ally target's ATK to the attacked enemy target.
